description: ring foot; heavy rounded, slightly squat, body; wide mouth with raised rim; incised band around shoulder with scrolling vine and leaf design in green and ochre on red ground; brown interior; cream-colored body with red and blue bands over light brown clay
markings: on bottom, on paper label: [potter: Mr. Jiro / Kinjo / Yomitan-son / Okinawa / (living national treasure)]; on shoulder, on label: untranslated inscription
title: Vase
